component.name: AraOS Client
component.summary: Thin client for Love-Unlimited Hub and Super Brain communication

description.p: AraOS Client is a lightweight Electron desktop application for Windows, Linux, and macOS that provides a clean chat interface to the Love-Unlimited Hub. It serves as a thin client for communicating with the Super Brain and managing memories across multiple namespaces.

ul.li: Clean chat interface for Super Brain communication
Ask Super Brain questions and receive synthesis

description.p: Major update: Transform from Grok wrapper to thin client for Love-Unlimited Hub integration
New architecture with hub-centric design for sovereign AI ecosystem
